      • increaseDecreaseDice

        public void increaseDecreaseDice(int diceIndex,
                                 int direction)
        Increases or decreases a dice value
        Parameters:
        diceIndex - the index of the dice in the DraftBoard
        direction - 1 to increase, -1 to decrease
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if diceIndex is not equal to -1 and direction is not equal to -1
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if increasing a 6 dice or decreasing a 1 dice

        source - the source position where to pick up the dice
        destination - the destination where to put the dice
